price: (58) So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرٗا لَّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalahum judhādhan illā kabīran lahum laʿallahum ilayhi yarjiʿūna
